DOC.brief_summary: In feasibility/pilot study , develop , refine , evaluate feasibility novel mental health/ophthalmologic intervention call , `` Collaborative Care Depression Diabetic Retinopathy '' ( CC-DDR ) , aim treat depression lower HbA1C old African Americans mild-to-moderate diabetic retinopathy ( DR ) comorbid depression .
DOC.brief_title: Collaborative Care Depression Diabetic Retinopathy African Americans
DOC.detailed_description: The Specific Aims : 1 . To develop CC-DDR treatment protocol . This involve : 1 . Creating initial version CC-DDR treatment protocol . 2 . Refining protocol base input expert panel expertise DR , depression , culturally relevant intervention diabetes old African Americans . 3 . Developing tool assess interventionist treatment adherence competence . 2 . To conduct open trial CC-DDR 40 participant poorly control diabetes , depression , mild moderate DR. During open trial : 1 . Evaluate feasibility CC-DDR . 2 . Refine CC-DDR treatment protocol incorporate feedback participant , community health care worker ( CHWs ) , ophthalmologist , expert panel . 3 . Refine procedure recruitment retention , outcome assessment , monitor treatment fidelity , CHW train supervision , quality assurance , study administration , base input investigator , CHWs , participant , expert panel . 4 . Examine CC-DDR 's impact depression severity ; diabetes self-management practice ; HbA1C level ; blood pressure ; adherence ophthalmologist treatment plan ; vision function ; quality life ; satisfaction CC-DDR . 3 . To complete Manual Procedures characterize aspect plan efficacy trial CC-DDR .
DOC.criteria: 1 . AfricanAmerican race 2. age ≥ 65 year 3. type 2 diabetes 4. mild moderate nonproliferative DR without macular edema 5. depressive symptom ( i.e. , Patient Health Questionnaire9 score ≥5 ) 6 . HbA1C ≥ 7.0 % 1. treated proliferative DR 2. global cognitive impairment ( i.e. , Mini Mental Status score ≤ 20 ) 3. psychiatric diagnosis depression 4. treatment depression start previous 3 month 5. life expectancy 2 year
